body:
This was originally filed for poll-cv (which was removed in #18298), but there seem to be failures regardless of the poller being used . The flake is relatively rare though.

```
test/cpp/server/load_reporter/load_reporter_test.cc:175
Value of: static_cast<double>(lb_feedback.calls_per_second())
Expected: is approximately 304.10000000000002 (absolute error <= 15.205000000000002)
  Actual: 280.093 (of type double), which is -24.0075 from 304.1
```

https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/c663ee89-56a6-444d-a8c8-dffe9598588e
https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/9e18c656-ef27-49af-8914-775153c98468
https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/bcdf9c9d-15c4-4605-a65d-f0633fd075ec
